original_text: You shall dwell in the land that I gave to your fathers, and you shall be my people, and I will be your God.
korean_text: 내가 너희 조상들에게 준 땅에서 너희가 거주하면서 내 백성이 되고 나는 너희 하나님이 되리라

sentences.original_text: You shall dwell in the land
that I gave to your fathers
and you shall be my people
and I will be your God
